summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Board of Public Works to purchase, from Kent Lumber Company, a corporation, certain lands in Township Twenty-two (22) North of Ranges Seven (7) and Eight (8) East, W. M., upon certain conditions, appropriating money from the General Fund in part payment therefor and directing the Mayor and City Comptroller to execute and deliver, in the name of the City of Seattle, a bill of sale for certain timber to said Kent Lumber Company, to complete the payment therefor.
